com.androidquery
Class AbstractAQuery<T extends AbstractAQuery<T>>

java.lang.Object
  com.androidquery.AbstractAQuery<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the generic type
All Implemented Interfaces:
Constants
Direct Known Subclasses:
AQuery
public abstract class AbstractAQuery<T extends AbstractAQuery<T>>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Constants

The core class of AQuery. Contains all the methods available from an AQuery object.

image

public T image(java.lang.String url,
               boolean memCache,
               boolean fileCache,
               int targetWidth,
               int fallbackId)
Set the image of an ImageView.

Parameters:
url - The image url.
memCache - Use memory cache.
fileCache - Use file cache.
targetWidth - Target width for down sampling when reading large images. 0 = no downsampling.
fallbackId - Fallback image if result is network fetch and image convert failed. 0 = no fallback.
Returns:
self

image

public T image(java.lang.String url,
               boolean memCache,
               boolean fileCache,
               int targetWidth,
               int fallbackId,
               Bitmap preset,
               int animId)
Set the image of an ImageView.

Parameters:
url - The image url.
memCache - Use memory cache.
fileCache - Use file cache.
targetWidth - Target width for down sampling when reading large images. 0 = no downsampling.
fallbackId - Fallback image if result is network fetch and image convert failed. 0 = no fallback.
preset - Default image to show before real image loaded. null = no preset.
animId - Apply this animation when image is loaded. 0 = no animation. Also accept AQuery.FADE_IN as a predefined 500ms fade in animation.
Returns:
self

image

public T image(java.lang.String url,
               boolean memCache,
               boolean fileCache,
               int targetWidth,
               int resId,
               BitmapAjaxCallback callback)
Set the image of an ImageView with a custom callback.

Parameters:
url - The image url.
memCache - Use memory cache.
fileCache - Use file cache.
targetWidth - Target width for down sampling when reading large images.
resId - Fallback image if result is network fetch and image convert failed.
callback - Callback handler for setting the image.
Returns:
self
